---
name: HHF2_promoter
creator: keoni
description: S. cerevisiae HHF2 promoter
prefix: TACA
suffix: AACT
sequence: 
---

Promoter region of the HHF2 gene encoding histone H4 in S. cerevisiae. This promoter is cell cycle regulated with peak expression during S phase, serving as a duplicate of HHF1 for histone production.
